question: Please explain in detail the virtues of performing Ibadat on Inaam-Raat (the night before the Day of Eid â€“ 1st night of Shawwal).
answer:
QUESTION
What kind of Ibadat is preferred on this night? Please quote all available Ahadith about this that may be available. May Allah S.W.T. accept our Fasting (Syam), Aameen.
ANSWER


Share:
There is no specific ibaadat (worship) to be performed in the night before
Eid. One may engage in any form of ibaadat, salaah, zikr, dua, tilawaat,
etc.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
